entry.title: $2200 // High ceilings ♠♠♠ and a private balcony. 1 bed, 2 bath
entry.content:
1 Bed / 2 Bath at 322 Grove St - Unit: 3F in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Small Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs, Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs. Beautiful 1 bed, 2 bath right off Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains. Amenities include rooftop access, central A/C, stainless steel appliances, a gas stove, hardwood floors, high ceilings and a private balcony. Close to the best of the neighborhood, including restaurants, bars and grocery stores.

Contact Me directly at 347 Five 695503 to schedule an appointment

entry.title: $2658 // Bushwick! Beautiful 3BR, Dishwasher, Laundry, J/M Trains, No Fee!
entry.content:
No Broker Fee!! Gorgeous, renovated 3 bedroom on a sunny street in Bushwick
-Hardwood floors throughout the roomy space
-Stainless steel appliances, inc. a dishwasher and microwave!
-Laundry-right-in-unit; bam!
-High ceilings, lots of windows, light au naturale
-Gorgeous bathroom tile detailing
-Right near the J/M for quick commutes to Williamsburg and Manhattan
-Skylight!!
-Offering one month free!!!! Net price advertised

Call or text me at show contact info for this steal before it's too late!
